text: Szürketaxi Futball Club was a Hungarian football club from the town of Budapest. ==History== Szürketaxi Futball Club debuted in the 1937–38 season of the Hungarian League and finished ninth. == Name Changes == *1932–1937: Szürketaxi FC *1937–1940: Taxisok *1940–1946: did not operate *1946–1947: Szürketaxi FC *1947: merger with MOGÜRT SC *1948: exit from MOGÜRT SC == References == ==External links== * Profile Category:Football clubs in Hungary Category:1932 establishments in Hungary
title: Szürketaxi FC
